last_episode_to_air.name: Donate Sharpe
last_episode_to_air.overview: An alleged drug deal gone wrong. Sharpe’s supporters say the physical evidence and eyewitness accounts don’t add up.

name: Final Appeal
overview: Brian Banks was a star football player with NFL aspirations before he was wrongfully convicted. He spent five years behind bars until he was fully exonerated a decade later. Final Appeal will follow Brian along with former prosecutor, Loni Coombs, as they attempt to unravel details of criminal cases where the defendants claim to have been wrongfully convicted. The series will expose viewers to a thrilling whodunit mystery as the puzzling cases unfold and potentially reveal new information that could change the fates of the suspected criminals.

episodes.name: Patty Prewitt
episodes.overview: Brian Banks and Loni Coombs take an intimate look at the case of Patty Prewitt who has been behind bars for over 30 years for the murder of her husband. Have Brian and Loni come upon new evidence that may change Patty's life forever?

episodes.name: Cleve Heidelberg
episodes.overview: Brian and Loni explore the case of Cleve Heidelberg, whose been behind bars for more than 45 years. With help from his estranged son could Cleve finally be exonerated for the murder he was convicted of committing all those years ago?

episodes.name: Katie Garding
episodes.overview: A young mother has been behind bars, convicted of vehicular manslaughter since 2008. Loni and Brian take a closer look at the details surrounding her case, and question whether or not she received a fair trial.

episodes.name: Donate Sharpe
episodes.overview: An alleged drug deal gone wrong. Sharpe’s supporters say the physical evidence and eyewitness accounts don’t add up.
